text: Hi I'm Gonzalo Gomez Herrero.

I’m the Principal Solutions
Architect at the Telecom IBU in AWS,

and I'm here today with Aijun
from Telefónica Tech.
Hello.

Hi, I am Aijun,
and I am from the Telefónica Tech group.

Aijun, last week,
we launched a new program

we called Integrated
Private Wireless on AWS.

It's a partnership program
with different CSPs,

with different telecommunication providers
across the world.

Telefónica
Tech has been one of our main partners.

The main intention is to bring private
5G based on AWS

to the market, to the enterprise customers
that some of these

communication service providers
would want to be able to reach to, right?
So tell us a bit about Telefónica Tech.
What are you doing in Telefónica Tech?

Well, as you know, Telefónica
Tech is a subdivision
of Telefonica, which is mainly focused on the technology
part, mostly related to the IoT,

big data, cybersecurity,
and also the cloud.

So in this case, we've launched
this partnership with Telefónica Tech,

and we've demonstrated an architecture,
which is a hybrid cloud architecture,

a combination of edge computing and some
other services running in the AWS region.

Tell us a bit about the architecture,
please.
Yeah.

I mean, this year, we have partnered up
with AWS in order to...

in this Mobile World
Congress in order to show a demo,

which its main focus
is to show the capabilities
of our private 5G network
with an industrial application.
Okay.

So private 5G is then
not only a technology per se for you.
It's more a technology enabler.

You are constructing a solution
with different

use cases on top of private 5G,
like AI/ML,
you’re using also IoT, et cetera, right?
So let's focus a bit on the architecture.

The architecture’s based on Snowball
Edge and services running in the region.

Just tell me a bit
about the different services we are using.
Okay.

This year,
we have deployed a private 5G core

inside of the AWS Edge infrastructure,
which is the Snowball Edge in this case.
Also, we have deployed other components
on top of the AWS Greengrass V2.

One of those components
is being developed by ourselves

at Telefónica Tech, which is a computer
visual model of Pokemon.
Okay.

Also, we have deployed another component
to communicate
with a PLC with industrial equipment.
Okay.

Then we have a combination of all these
different components running locally,

but do you also provide
some other analytics data, for instance,
back to your customers?

I mean, of course,
because all the data is gathered up now

in the edge
or on the premise in the factory.

It's also important to forward
this data to the cloud part,

because you can do more extensive
analytics.
You can do some business intelligence.

Also, for example, in the part
of the training of the computer visual

model, we have used the AWS SageMaker
in order to do the heavy

lifting part because resources on
the cloud are unlimited.
Okay.
So thank you very much.

That was a good description of the demo
that we have just exposed here at MWC.

Thank you very much,
Telefónica Tech, for this partnership.
We want to take it forward

to the next level and work with you
together in developing further solutions.

Thank you.
Okay. Thank you to you, Gonzalo.
